meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stylish and elegant.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded classinesses at the party.
meanings.sent2: The ballroom was filled with classinesses and charm.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the classinesses of the elegant swan.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion had an air of classinesses that was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of classinesses in its intricate details.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being sophisticated and refined.
meanings.sent1: The gentleman's demeanor exuded classinesses in every gesture.
meanings.sent2: The event was a showcase of classinesses and grace.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled with an unexpected touch of classinesses.
meanings.sent4: Her words carried a sense of classinesses that left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The antique vase symbolized the timeless classinesses of the past.
